input_topic: Resveratrol supplementation and type 2 diabetes: a systematic review and meta-analysis

queries.query_string: (Resveratrol OR trans-Resveratrol OR 3,5,4'-trihydroxystilbene OR stilbene) AND ("Diabetes Mellitus, Type 2" OR T2DM OR "Insulin Resistance" OR hyperglycemia OR "Impaired Glucose Tolerance" OR prediabetes) NOT ("systematic review"[Publication Type] OR "meta-analysis"[Publication Type] OR "review"[Publication Type])
queries.rationale: A wide search using high-level synonyms for both the intervention and the condition to maximize sensitivity and capture varied terminology across different journals.

queries.query_type: MeSH Term Focus with Study Types
queries.query_string: ("Resveratrol"[MeSH] AND "Diabetes Mellitus, Type 2"[MeSH]) AND ("Clinical Trial"[Publication Type] OR "Randomized Controlled Trial"[Publication Type] OR "Controlled Study"[Publication Type]) NOT ("systematic review"[Publication Type] OR "meta-analysis"[Publication Type] OR "review"[Publication Type])
queries.rationale: Uses controlled vocabulary (MeSH) for high precision, explicitly focusing on robust intervention study designs (RCTs, Controlled Trials) in humans.

queries.query_string: (resveratrol[tiab] AND (HbA1c[tiab] OR HOMA-IR[tiab] OR "insulin sensitivity"[tiab] OR "glucose control"[tiab])) NOT ("systematic review"[Publication Type] OR "meta-analysis"[Publication Type] OR "review"[Publication Type])
queries.rationale: Focuses on papers where both Resveratrol and key metabolic outcomes (biomarkers of glycemic control) are central to the study (appearing in the title or abstract).

queries.query_string: (Resveratrol AND Supplementation AND (T2DM OR NIDDM OR prediabetes)) AND (Humans[Mesh]) NOT ("systematic review"[Publication Type] OR "meta-analysis"[Publication Type] OR "review"[Publication Type])
queries.rationale: Ensures the search is limited to human studies and specifically includes the term 'Supplementation' to capture relevant nutritional intervention trials.

queries.query_string: (Resveratrol OR SRT501) AND ("Insulin Resistance" OR "Oxidative Stress" OR "SIRT1" OR "Glucose Metabolism") NOT ("systematic review"[Publication Type] OR "meta-analysis"[Publication Type] OR "review"[Publication Type])
queries.rationale: Captures studies that might not explicitly use 'Diabetes Mellitus, Type 2' but focus on the proposed underlying mechanisms or pathways targeted by resveratrol in the context of T2D pathology.

queries.query_string: (Resveratrol AND T2DM) AND ("randomized controlled trial"[pt] OR "clinical trial"[pt]) AND (2010:2024[dp]) NOT ("systematic review"[Publication Type] OR "meta-analysis"[Publication Type] OR "review"[Publication Type])
queries.rationale: Limits the search to the most recent decade (2010 onwards) to identify contemporary studies using modern diagnostic criteria and pharmacological standards, focusing only on high-quality intervention trials.

queries.query_type: Specific Chemical Structure and T2D Abbreviations
queries.query_string: ("3,5,4'-trihydroxystilbene" OR "Resveratrol formulation") AND (T2DM OR NIDDM) NOT ("systematic review"[Publication Type] OR "meta-analysis"[Publication Type] OR "review"[Publication Type])
queries.rationale: Uses specific chemical naming and older/less common abbreviations to capture highly technical papers or older seminal works that might be missed by broader synonym searches.

usage_instructions.api_usage: Use these queries with PubMed E-utilities API
usage_instructions.rate_limiting: Respect NCBI rate limits (3 requests/second max)
